english: It was not until he reached new york and started out to make the new york journal the most widely read paper in the united states that yellow journalism reached the limit .
chinese: 他到达纽约并且把《纽约新闻》办成美国最广泛阅读的报纸的时候，黄色新闻才达到它的顶峰。

english: Usually by an sensational way in order to satisfy the demands of audience for information and entertainment . from its birth , tabloid journalism has experienced several periods of high tides : the era of penny newspapers in 1930s and 1940s ; the era of yellow journalism in late 19th century ; the era of jazz journalism in 1920s " and contemporary time
chinese: 小报新闻是伴随着报纸的大众化而产生的一种文化现象它在西方新闻史上有过这样几个高潮时期：廉价报纸兴起时期、黄色新闻时期、上世纪20年代的爵士新闻时期以及目前小报新闻向多种媒体渗透时期。
黄色新闻造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
